event.description: Alfonso Soriano flies out to center fielder Jason Michaels.
Ryan Theriot walks.
Kosuke Fukudome singles on a ground ball to right fielder Hunter Pence. Ryan Theriot to 3rd.
With Aramis Ramirez batting, Ivan Rodriguez picks off Ryan Theriot at 3rd on throw to Jeff Keppinger.
Aramis Ramirez walks. Kosuke Fukudome to 2nd.
Micah Hoffpauir singles on a fly ball to right fielder Hunter Pence. Kosuke Fukudome scores. Aramis Ramirez to 2nd.
Milton Bradley strikes out swinging.
Mike Fontenot reaches on a missed catch error by first baseman Lance Berkman, assist to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Geovany Soto singles on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee. Mike Fontenot to 2nd.
Ted Lilly bunt pops out to pitcher Russ Ortiz.
Alfonso Soriano grounds into a double play, third baseman Jeff Keppinger to second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman. Geovany Soto out at 2nd.
Ryan Theriot singles on a fly ball to center fielder Jason Michaels.
Kosuke Fukudome walks. Ryan Theriot to 2nd.
Aramis Ramirez singles on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee. Ryan Theriot to 3rd. Kosuke Fukudome to 2nd.
Micah Hoffpauir pops out to third baseman Jeff Keppinger in foul territory.
Milton Bradley singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence. Ryan Theriot scores. Kosuke Fukudome to 3rd. Aramis Ramirez to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Tim Byrdak replaces Russ Ortiz, batting 9th.
Mike Fontenot out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Jason Michaels. Kosuke Fukudome scores.
Geovany Soto flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Ted Lilly flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Alfonso Soriano homers (8) on a fly ball to center field.
Ryan Theriot strikes out swinging.
Kosuke Fukudome grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Pitching Change: Chris Sampson replaces Tim Byrdak, batting 9th, replacing Geoff Blum.
Aramis Ramirez flies out to center fielder Jason Michaels.
Micah Hoffpauir grounds out to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Milton Bradley pops out to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Mike Fontenot flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Geovany Soto grounds out, third baseman Jeff Keppinger to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Ted Lilly strikes out swinging.
Alfonso Soriano flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Ryan Theriot grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Kosuke Fukudome grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Pitching Change: Wesley Wright replaces Chris Sampson, batting 9th, replacing Michael Bourn.
Aramis Ramirez singles on a ground ball to shortstop Miguel Tejada.
Micah Hoffpauir doubles (4) on a fly ball to center fielder Jason Michaels. Aramis Ramirez to 3rd.
Milton Bradley called out on strikes.
Mike Fontenot called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Felipe Paulino replaces Wesley Wright, batting 9th.
Geovany Soto called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Aaron Miles replaces Carlos Marmol.
Aaron Miles singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence, deflected by first baseman Lance Berkman.
Alfonso Soriano homers (9) on a fly ball to left center field. Aaron Miles scores.
Ryan Theriot doubles (4) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Kosuke Fukudome flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Aramis Ramirez singles on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee. Ryan Theriot scores.
Micah Hoffpauir walks. Aramis Ramirez to 2nd.
Joey Gathright singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Lee. Aramis Ramirez to 3rd. Micah Hoffpauir to 2nd.
Mike Fontenot walks. Aramis Ramirez scores. Micah Hoffpauir to 3rd. Joey Gathright to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Alberto Arias replaces Felipe Paulino, batting 9th.
Geovany Soto grounds into a double play, third baseman Jeff Keppinger to second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman. Mike Fontenot out at 2nd.
Kazuo Matsui walks.
Miguel Tejada homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Kazuo Matsui scores.
Lance Berkman grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Carlos Lee singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Hunter Pence singles on a line drive to right fielder Milton Bradley. Carlos Lee to 2nd.
Jason Michaels grounds into a double play, pitcher Ted Lilly to second baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir. Hunter Pence out at 2nd.
Ivan Rodriguez strikes out swinging.
Jeff Keppinger flies out to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Russ Ortiz called out on strikes.
Kazuo Matsui grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Miguel Tejada doubles (9) on a fly ball to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Lance Berkman called out on strikes.
Carlos Lee walks.
Hunter Pence flies out to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Jason Michaels walks.
Ivan Rodriguez flies out to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
With Jeff Keppinger batting, Jason Michaels steals (1) 2nd base.
Jeff Keppinger pops out to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Geoff Blum replaces Tim Byrdak.
Geoff Blum called out on strikes.
Kazuo Matsui bunt grounds out to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Miguel Tejada pops out to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir in foul territory.
Lance Berkman strikes out swinging, catcher Geovany Soto to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Carlos Lee flies out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Hunter Pence flies out to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Jason Michaels flies out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Pitching Change: Aaron Heilman replaces Ted Lilly, batting 9th.
Ivan Rodriguez strikes out swinging.
Jeff Keppinger reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Aramis Ramirez. Jeff Keppinger to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Michael Bourn replaces Chris Sampson.
Michael Bourn strikes out swinging.
Kazuo Matsui grounds out, shortstop Ryan Theriot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Defensive switch from center field to right field for Kosuke Fukudome.
Pitching Change: Carlos Marmol replaces Aaron Heilman, batting 9th.
Defensive Substitution: Joey Gathright replaces right fielder Milton Bradley, batting 6th, playing center field.
Miguel Tejada hits a ground-rule double (10) on a fly ball down the right-field line.
Lance Berkman strikes out swinging.
Carlos Lee strikes out swinging.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Chad Fox replaces Carlos Marmol, batting 4th, replacing third baseman Aramis Ramirez.
Defensive switch from second base to third base for Mike Fontenot.
Aaron Miles remains in the game as the second baseman.
Jason Michaels walks.
Ivan Rodriguez triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Joey Gathright. Jason Michaels scores.
Jeff Keppinger grounds out, third baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir. Ivan Rodriguez scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Darin Erstad replaces Alberto Arias.
Darin Erstad triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Joey Gathright.
Pitching Change: Kevin Gregg replaces Chad Fox, batting 4th.
Kazuo Matsui out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Joey Gathright. Darin Erstad scores.
Miguel Tejada singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Lance Berkman strikes out swinging.
